sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.debugger" name="Server-side JavaScript Debugger" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" cache_flush="true" state="published" type="application"> <requires> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.angular"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.zepto"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.font_icons"/> </requires>
<description>Provides interactive debugging of server-side JavaScript.</description>
<extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="GlideDebuggerProcessor" class="com.glide.debugger.javascript_debugger.GlideDebuggerProcessor"/> <extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="BreakpointProcessor" class="com.glide.debugger.javascript_debugger.BreakpointProcessor"/> <extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="ScopeExplorerProcessor" class="com.glide.debugger.javascript_debugger.ScopeExplorerProcessor"/> <extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="GlideDebuggerConsoleInspectionProcessor" class="com.glide.debugger.javascript_debugger.GlideDebuggerConsoleInspectionProcessor"/> <extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="GlideDebuggerScriptProcessor" class="com.glide.debugger.javascript_debugger.GlideDebuggerScriptProcessor"/> <extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="GlideDebuggerConfigProcessor" class="com.glide.debugger.javascript_debugger.GlideDebuggerConfigProcessor"/> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>Provides interactive debugging of server-side JavaScript.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.debugger</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Server-side JavaScript Debugger</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.debugger/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.ui.angular,com.glide.ui.zepto,com.glide.ui.font_icons</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.debugger</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
